sentences.en: Fox was making a long parenthetical remark about his travels on the border of the country.
sentences.cn: 福克斯正在插入一大段题外话，讲他在该国边境游历的故事。
关于他童年时期的补充说明

sentences.en: Yes, I had a parenthetical aside about Clinton - era growth being faster than most people realize. So?
sentences.cn: 是的, 中间我插了一句道克林顿时期的增长率比许多人想象得要快. 怎么了?

words.tran_cn: 附带说明地；作为插入成分地；顺便说一句

trans.tran_en: said or written while you are talking or writing about something else in order to explain something or add information
